values:
becki 
hi
have i got news for you. sam and mikey were talking about you today saying they were missing you because you havent been down in a while and he has spit p with jemma. 
but today we just went tennis and they got their skateboards out again and we just went down the streets.
i got my pink converse yesterday. lol i will let you have them when your down to go out in if i dont get any more paint on my black ones. lol.
i havent been up to much though today. i did a ollie higher again today and it worked. 
* i have only been on mikey skateboard for 2 weeks everyday* i can now do it. i was really pleased. 
he let me do the little moves but not all the big ones. but i make him. he was showing us all his new moves he had been doing. he has improved. you got to come down and see. you wont think i am telling the truth but your cuz came down to us and just started being nice so we are all mates again now and everyone got on. it was great. 
but she said she wants to start to learn some tricks. 

kaida
(kas)lol
xxx
